name: True Strength: The Tale of Kenji (Kinetic Visual Novel) (Dellanime Productions)
name_original: True Strength: The Tale of Kenji (Kinetic Visual Novel) (Dellanime Productions)
description:
Alright So this is a reupload of the very first visual novel I ever made. Pleeeease don't judge it too hard cause I was a lot younger back then annnnnd a lot more cringey lol.

Anyways This story Revolves around Kenji and his search for true strength on a distant planet he was sent to as an outcast. Along with his partner Kibiki, he meets others and tries to make peace with himself as well as vanquish a great evil. This is the story of Kenji......

To see my visual novel updates and progressions, check out my website :D

https://dellanimevisualnovels.wordpress.com
